name: Sifu
greetingText: BTW I really like your name, voice basically everything about you!
wishText: Aap meri zindgi ko bahut special banate ho, me kitha bhi jhagdu par ye baat ni badal sakta ki aap mere liye special hai, and me aapke saath hi ladte jhagadte, roast karte hue zindgi bitana chahta hoon!
